title: Best of The Herd 12/16/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd 12/16/2019
description:
Colin is not impressed with the Cowboys win over the Rams because it shouldn't have taken them until week 15 to figure things out. He explains why Russell Wilson is the MVP, not Lamar Jackson. And, he is still not buying the Packers as a real NFC contender. Colin admits where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Plus, Super Bowl Champion James Harrison talks about why Freddie Kitchens needs to be fired and why the Patriots probably did nothing wrong but should be punished anyway for their latest video-taping scandal.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
